trans-unit.target: TEXT_BANVAN102_02172_SEQ_00<tab>Muna Vanu is looking for a capable adventurer to help procure some unusual ingredients. ※The difficulty of this quest will be synced to your current level.

TEXT_BANVAN102_02172_SEQ_01<tab>The Gundu tribe's stores of firewood dwindle. Should they be exhausted, the tribe will be forced to face the cold winds of the Abalathian nights without so much as a campfire to warm them. Wood is hard to come by in the Sea of Clouds, but the knights of Camp Cloudtop have been happy to trade in the past. Knowing that Vanu delicacies are prized by the troops manning the camp, Muna Vanu plans to prepare traditional Gundu catsfoot chew to trade for kindling. This required catsfoot herb can be found near Ok' Zundu, he tells you, northeast of his tribe's camp.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANVAN102_02172_SEQ_02<tab>You find three particularly striking specimens of catsfoot. Hurry them back to Muna Vanu while they are still fresh.

TEXT_BANVAN102_02172_SEQ_03<tab>With the fragrant wildgrasses you gathered, Muna Vanu is able to add the finishing touches to his authentic Gundu cuisine. Now the task remains to take it to Caribault at Camp Cloudtop and trade it for firewood.

TEXT_BANVAN102_02172_SEQ_04<tab>When you show Caribault the catsfoot chew, his eyes light up. His camp has more firewood than they can store, so he is more than happy to let you take all you can carry in exchange for the delicious Gundu treat. See it safely back to Muna Vanu.

TEXT_BANVAN102_02172_SEQ_05<tab>Muna Vanu thanks you sincerely for obtaining firewood for his tribe. He explains that they have a long history of trading with so-called netherlings in the past, and Gundu snacks have always been a powerful bartering resource─he even considers repaying his tribe's growing debt to you in catsfoot chew...
TEXT_BANVAN102_02172_TODO_00<tab>Gather catsfoot from around Ok' Zundu.
TEXT_BANVAN102_02172_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the catsfoot to Muna Vanu.
TEXT_BANVAN102_02172_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the catsfoot chew to Caribault at Camp Cloudtop.
TEXT_BANVAN102_02172_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the dry firewood to Muna Vanu.

TEXT_BANVAN102_02172_MUNAVANU_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Gundu have need of your strength once more. Tribe wants for kindling and firewood. Nearby netherling knights have plenty of firewood. Netherling knights <var 1A 02 /var>also<var 1A 01 /var> have eye for delicious Vanu delicacies...

TEXT_BANVAN102_02172_MUNAVANU_000_001<tab>Muna Vanu wishes to make delectable catsfoot chew to trade with netherlings, but lacks most important ingredient. Catsfoot chew without catsfoot is like blue sky without sun!

TEXT_BANVAN102_02172_MUNAVANU_000_002<tab>But do not fear─it blooms wild all around Ok' Zundu. Muna Vanu prepares other ingredients now. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, please gather three sprigs of catsfoot.
TEXT_BANVAN102_02172_MUNAVANU_000_010<tab>Zephyr winds bring <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> back to Muna Vanu. Does netherling harvest catsfoot?

TEXT_BANVAN102_02172_MUNAVANU_000_011<tab>Yes! These are perfect─ripe and fragrant! With these, I make delicious treat, warm and bright as sun rising over new day. Mix this...and this...and dash of that...
TEXT_BANVAN102_02172_MUNAVANU_000_012<tab>...And complete! Look, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Do you ever see more beautiful sight? Do you ever smell more beautiful a fragrance?
TEXT_BANVAN102_02172_MUNAVANU_000_013<tab>Please, take catsfoot chew to place netherlings call Camp Cloudtop. Deliver to man called Caribault.
TEXT_BANVAN102_02172_MUNAVANU_000_014<tab>Caribault trades with Gundu. He loves Gundu food, and will trade much firewood for this. May tailwinds speed netherling to him.
TEXT_BANVAN102_02172_CARIBAULT_000_020<tab>You want firewood, do you? Well I'm not in the habit of giving stuff away for free. What have you got to trade for it?
TEXT_BANVAN102_02172_CARIBAULT_000_021<tab>Ohohoh! I daresay this is authentic Vanu catsfoot chew! I think you have yourself a deal.
TEXT_BANVAN102_02172_CARIBAULT_000_022<tab>They're made from wildflowers, you know, and the texture is just sublime. I can't get enough of these things─you must tell me where you got it!

TEXT_BANVAN102_02172_CARIBAULT_000_023<tab>Whatever the case, I'd be more than happy to trade. We have more firewood than we know what to do with right now. Take as much as you like─hells, take as much as you can!
TEXT_BANVAN102_02172_CARIBAULT_000_024<tab>I've always wanted to know how they get this incredible spongy texture... They're so <var 1A 02 /var>chewy<var 1A 01 /var>!
TEXT_BANVAN102_02172_MUNAVANU_000_030<tab>Greetings, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Muna Vanu welcomes you back. Do netherling knights share firewood with Gundu?

TEXT_BANVAN102_02172_MUNAVANU_000_031<tab>Many thanks for this. In Sea of Clouds, trees and wood are as precious as water in driest desert. Even Gundu of old Ok' Gundu often trade with netherlings for wood in days past.

TEXT_BANVAN102_02172_MUNAVANU_000_032<tab>Vanu snacks are always appreciated as gifts─and valuable for trading. Memories of old Ok' Gundu are soft and familiar, like stone worn smooth by wind and rain.

TEXT_BANVAN102_02172_MUNAVANU_000_033<tab>With these memories, Muna Vanu prepares treats just as they were, with finest wildflowers and freshest wamouracampa meat, so that netherlings love them as much as they always have.

TEXT_BANVAN102_02172_MUNAVANU_000_034<tab>Thank you for your assistance, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. One day Muna Vanu treats you to feast in gratitude─with perfectly prepared catsfoot chew!
